public class Unserializer
extends DataInputStream
See Also:
java

Unserializer(InputStream, OpenerRecipe)
The new Unserializer will read 'in', using 'maker' as the source of authority for making various objects.

decodeObj()
Decode an s-expression into an object or null.
decodeObject()
Decode an s-expression into an object or null.
done()
Returns the internal vector and invalidates this Unserializer
insertObjectInTable(int, Object)
Method from RtDecoder that Unserializer should not implement
replaceObjectInTable(Object, Object)
Method from RtDecoder that Unserializer should not implement
